name: DRB, INC. d/b/a Superior Homes and Bonnie Heights Homes, Appellants v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee
name_abbreviation: DRB, Inc. v. Pennsylvania Department of Labor & Industry

parties: DRB, INC. d/b/a Superior Homes and Bonnie Heights Homes, Appellants v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28rd day of November, 2005, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
887 A.2d 1216
DRB, INC. d/b/a Superior Homes and Bonnie Heights Homes, Appellants v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee.
